chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
Puniq: is_true (uniq pts)
n: Equality.sort nat_eqType
d: dstatelet
C: TPCCoh d
pf: is_true (n \in nodes)
m: PStateT
l: Log

Goal:
n \in pts -> getLocal n d = st :-> m \+ log :-> l -> getStP C pf = m

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
getStP : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in nodes -> PStateT
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
log = ptr_nat 2 : ptr
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
TPCCoh = CohPred (CohPredMixin l1 l2 l3) : Coherence.cohpred (fun=> [eta nodes])
PStateT = (nat * PState)%type : Set
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
nid = nat : Set
st = ptr_nat 1 : ptr
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
Notation seq := list
nodes = [:: cn] ++ pts ++ others : seq nid
locCn : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in nodes -> valid (getLocal n d) /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom (getLocal n d))
getStC_K : forall (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh d) (m : CStateT) (l : Log), getLocal cn d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStC C = m
localCoh = fun n : nid => Pred_of_Simpl [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom h)] : nid -> Pred heap
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : TPCCoh d pf : n \in nodes m : PStateT l : Log |- Type] ?P : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : TPCCoh d pf : n \in nodes m : PStateT l : Log |- ?A -> Type]
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : TPCCoh d pf : n \in nodes m : PStateT l : Log |- Type]
cohStP : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in pts -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (getLocal n d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = PStateT
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : TPCCoh d pf : n \in nodes m : PStateT l : Log |- Type]
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
locU : forall (n n' : nat_eqType) (x : heap) (st : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap)) (s : soup), n != n' -> valid st -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n' x st; dsoup := s |} = getLocal n {| dstate := st; dsoup := s |}
a_step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
Actions.step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
tpc_coh = fun d : dstatelet => [/\ soupCoh (dsoup d), dom (dstate d) =i nodes, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes -> localCoh n (getLocal n d)] : dstatelet -> Prop
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) -> getLocal n (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
locE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (n : nid) (x : heap) (y : soup), valid (dstate d) -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n x (dstate d); dsoup := y |} = x
Record mixin_of (U : pcm) : Type := Mixin { undef_op : PCM.sort U; unitb_op : U -> bool; _ : forall x : U, reflect (x = Unit) (unitb_op x); _ : forall x y : U, x \+ y = Unit -> x = Unit /\ y = Unit; _ : is_true (~~ valid undef_op); _ : forall x : U, undef_op \+ x = undef_op } Arguments TPCM.Mixin [U undef_op] [unitb_op]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope _ _%function_scope
cohStC : forall d : dstatelet, TPCCoh d -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (getLocal cn d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = CStateT
hcancel2V : forall (A : Type) (x1 x2 : ptr) (v1 v2 : A) (h1 h2 : heap), valid (x1 :-> v1 \+ h1) -> x1 : -> v1 \+ h1 = x2 : -> v2 \+ h2 -> if x1 == x2 then v1 = v2 /\ h1 = h2 else [/\ free x1 h2 = free x2 h1, h1 = x2 : -> v2 \+ free x1 h2 & h2 = x1 : -> v1 \+ free x2 h1]
hcancelV : forall (A : Type) (x : ptr) (v1 v2 : A) (h1 h2 : heap), valid (x :-> v1 \+ h1) -> x : -> v1 \+ h1 = x : -> v2 \+ h2 -> [/\ v1 = v2, valid h1 & h1 = h2]
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
hcancelT : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (x : ptr) (v1 : A1) (v2 : A2) (h1 h2 : heap), valid (x :-> v1 \+ h1) -> x : -> v1 \+ h1 = x : -> v2 \+ h2 -> A1 = A2
domPtUnX : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (x : ptr) (i : union_map_classPCM heapUMC), valid (x :-> v \+ i) -> x \in dom (x :-> v \+ i)
empty_lstate = fix empty_lstate (ns : seq nid) : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) := match ns with | [::] => Unit | n :: ns' => n \\ -> Heap.empty \+ empty_lstate ns' end : seq nid -> union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) Arguments empty_lstate _%seq_scope
heap_eta : forall (x : ptr) (h : heap), x \in dom h -> exists (A : Type) (v : A), find x h = Some (idyn v) /\ h = x : -> v \+ free x h
this_not_pts : forall this : nat_eqType, this \in pts -> (this == cn) = false
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
heap_eta2 = fun (A : Type) (x : ptr) (h : heap) (v : A) (E : find x h = Some (idyn v)) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (x0 : Type) (p : (fun A0 : Type => exists v0 : A0, find x h = Some (idyn v0) /\ h = x :-> v0 \+ free x h) x0), (fun=> h = x :-> v \+ free x h) (ex_intro (fun A0 : Type => exists v0 : A0, find x h = Some (idyn v0) /\ h = x :-> v0 \+ free x h) x0 p) => match heap_eta (find_some E) as e return ((fun=> h = x :-> v \+ free x h) e) with | @ex_intro _ _ x0 x1 => _evar_0_ x0 x1 end) (fun (B : Type) (__top_assumption_ : exists v0 : B, find x h...
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
hcancelPtV : forall (A : Type) (x : ptr) (v1 v2 : A), valid (x :-> v1) -> x : -> v1 = x : -> v2 -> v1 = v2
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
domPtX : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (x : ptr), valid (x :-> v) -> x \in dom (x :-> v)
hcancelPtV2 : forall (A : Type) (x1 x2 : ptr) (v1 v2 : A), valid (x1 :-> v1) -> x1 : -> v1 = x2 : -> v2 -> (x1, v1) = (x2, v2)
hcancelPtT : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (x : ptr) (v1 : A1) (v2 : A2), valid (x :-> v1) -> x : -> v1 = x : -> v2 -> A1 = A2
network_rely = fun (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) => exists n : nat, network_rely' w this n s1 s2 : world -> nid -> state -> state -> Prop
hcancelPtT2 : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (x1 x2 : ptr) (v1 : A1) (v2 : A2), valid (x1 :-> v1) -> x1 : -> v1 = x2 : -> v2 -> (x1, A1) = (x2, A2)
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]

```coq
intros.
intro HinPts.
intros[HnInSt HgetLocal].
destruct (Hnin n) as [HnNeqCn |HnInPts].
- subst. apply getStC_K in HgetLocal. rewrite HgetLocal. reflexivity.
- destruct (Puniq pts) as [HptsUniq|].
  + destruct (locCn n) as [_ [Hvalid Hm]].
    * apply HptsUniq. apply HinPts.
    * destruct (Hm HnInPts) as [s [l' Heq]].
      apply locE' in Heq. rewrite <- Heq in HgetLocal. inversion HgetLocal.
  + inversion Huniq.
```

original: intros. intro HinPts. intros[HnInSt HgetLocal]. destruct (Hnin n) as [HnNeqCn |HnInPts]. - subst. apply getStC_K in HgetLocal. rewrite HgetLocal. reflexivity. - destruct (Puniq pts) as [HptsUniq|]. + destruct (locCn n) as [_ [Hvalid Hm]]. * apply HptsUniq. apply HinPts. * destruct (Hm HnInPts) as [s [l' Heq]]. apply locE' in Heq. rewrite <- Heq in HgetLocal. inversion HgetLocal. + inversion Huniq.
